spiritsExplanation:
The metadata for this video strongly aligns with the 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit. The title and description repeatedly emphasize 'HIIT,' 'Insane,' and 'Fat Burning,' indicating a focus on vigorous effort and energy expenditure. The video involves sprint training with 12 rounds of 30-second high-intensity intervals, separated by low-intensity recovery periods, which is a hallmark of high-intensity training. The comments from viewers discussing the intensity ('couldn't complete 6 rounds') and personal improvement reinforce this classification. Hence, a score of 0.9 reflects this strong match.

The 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit is also relevant due to the methodical approach described: a structured sequence of intervals (12 rounds of 30 seconds with 90 seconds of rest), a warm-up, and a cool-down, showcasing planned progression and adherence to a specific fitness protocol. This structured nature justifies a score of 0.7.

Other spirits, such as 'Flow & Rhythm' or 'Soothing & Restorative,' are not applicable due to the workout's explicit focus on high effort and intensity, rather than smooth continuity or relaxation.
